cboCostEstimates.description: As ordered reported by the House Committee on the Judiciary on September 29, 2021
cboCostEstimates.title: H.R. 5374, SHOP SAFE Act of 2021

constitutionalAuthorityStatementText:
[Congressional Record Volume 167, Number 167 (Sunday, September 26, 2021)]
[House]
From the Congressional Record Online through the Government Publishing Office [www.gpo.gov]
By Mr. NADLER:
H.R. 5374.
Congress has the power to enact this legislation pursuant
to the following:
Article 1; Section 8, Clause 3 of the U.S. Constitution,
which gives Congress the power ``[t]o regulate commerce with
foreign nations, and among the several states, and with the
Indian tribes.''
[Page H5178]

latestAction.text: Ordered to be Reported in the Nature of a Substitute by the Yeas and Nays: 30 - 8.

title: SHOP SAFE Act
